thread.title: Lowell man arrested for alleged activities at his NH auto dealership
thread.title_full: Lowell man arrested for alleged activities at his NH auto dealership

author: Aaron Curtis
title: Lowell man arrested for alleged activities at his NH auto dealership
text:
News Crime and Public Safety Crime and Public Safety | Lowell man arrested for alleged activities at his NH auto dealership Share this: Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Click to share on X (Opens in new window) Matthew Lefebvre, 33, of Lowell, the owner of the auto dealership Only Dealz, based in Derry, New Hampshire, is accused of submitting a fraudulent lease agreement to the Division of Motor Vehicles and failing to obtain a surety bond for each community in which the dealer had a place of business. (Courtesy New Hampshire State Police) By Aaron Curtis | acurtis@lowellsun.com | Lowell Sun UPDATED: August 8, 2024 at 4:58 p.m. DERRY, N.H. â€” A Lowell man, who owns Only Dealz LLC, is facing two criminal charges for his alleged actions as the owner of the Derry-based automotive dealership, according to the New Hampshire State Police.
Police said Matthew Lefebvre, 33, is accused of submitting a fraudulent lease agreement to the Division of Motor Vehicles and failing to obtain a surety bond for each community in which the dealer had a place of business.
On Thursday, Lefebvre was arrested on a warrant without incident. He is charged with one count of tampering with public records and one count of bond required, both misdemeanor offenses.
Lefebvre is scheduled to be arraigned on the charges in Concord District Court at 8:15 a.m. Sept. 27.
Police asked anyone with additional information about this case to contact Detective Nick Quintiliani at nicholas.d.quintiliani@dos.nh.gov.
Follow Aaron Curtis on X, formerly known as Twitter, @aselahcurtis
